translation.en: [man] It's a brave new world, isn't it?
Within a decade, we could be reviving extinct species.
translation.es: Y en una década, podríamos revivir especies extintas.

translation.en: The thylacline, the woolly mammoth, saber-toothed cats.
translation.es: El tilacino, el mamut lanudo, los dientes de sable.

translation.en: Looks like Steven Spielberg's gonna get his park after all.
translation.es: Parece que Spielberg tendrá su parque después de todo.

translation.en: I think you've had to listen to me for long enough.
translation.es: Creo que ya me han escuchado lo suficiente.

translation.en: No matter what your politics are,
translation.es: No importa cuál sea su postura política,

translation.en: we know that climate change is causing glacial deterioration.
translation.es: sabemos que el cambio climático está causando el deterioro glacial.

translation.en: We also know that there are viruses and bacterias
translation.es: También sabemos que hay virus y bacterias
atrapados en el hielo que se derrite.

translation.en: a prehistoric equivalent of the Zika virus,
translation.es: que un equivalente prehistórico del virus del Zika,
del Ébola o de la peste bubónica

translation.en: were to appear as a result of the melt.
Our bodies would have no immunity.
And we would have no vaccines that could help us.
translation.es: Y no tendríamos vacunas. CUMBRE GLOBAL SOBRE ENFERMEDADES INFECCIOSAS

translation.en: I don't think it's going to be asteroids or nuclear war that wipes us out.
translation.es: no creo que sean asteroides o una guerra nuclear lo que nos aniquile.

translation.en: Ancient forms of these pathogens could start a pandemic
translation.es: Las versiones antiguas de estos patógenos podrían provocar una pandemia

translation.en: that makes the bubonic plague look like-- like a chicken pox party.
translation.es: que haga que la peste bubónica parezca un grupo de niños con varicela.

translation.en: This isn't nature crying out for help.
translation.es: Esta no es la naturaleza pidiendo ayuda.

translation.en: And that is why I'm calling on you,
translation.es: Y por eso recurro a ustedes,

translation.en: to come together and pool your resources and knowledge to get ahead of this.
translation.es: para unirnos y juntar sus recursos y su conocimiento para adelantarnos a esto.

translation.en: And the data tells us that this is inevitable.
translation.es: Y los datos indican que es inevitable.

translation.en: Listening to you talk about mass extinction really gets me goin'.
translation.es: Escucharte hablar de extinción masiva me excita mucho.

translation.en: Um... I'm sorry. I'm a... married man.
translation.es: Lo siento. Soy un hombre casado.

translation.en: I apologize for the interruption, Dr. Swann.
translation.es: Me disculpo por la interrupción, Dr. Swann.

translation.en: Dr. Lansing is a colleague -from the Arctic Science Exchange. -Oh.
translation.es: ...el Dr. Lansing es un colega del Intercambio Científico del Ártico.

translation.en: It's probably terrible timing, but, um...
translation.es: Quizás sea un mal momento, pero...

translation.en: we lost contact with Dr. Vercernis
at the Arctic Research Station three days ago.
translation.es: en la Estación de Investigación del Ártico hace tres días.

translation.en: Oh, well, the weather regularly knocks out communications there.
translation.es: El clima afecta constantemente las comunicaciones.

translation.en: -I'm... I'm sure he's okay. -Yes, you're probably right.
translation.es: Debe estar bien. Sí, quizás tenga razón.

translation.en: The thing is, last we heard from him,
translation.es: Lo último que oímos de él

translation.en: he'd found something, and he was pretty excited.
translation.es: fue que encontró algo y estaba muy emocionado.

translation.en: He wanted to talk to you about it.
Needless to say, we're all anxious to get some updates.
translation.es: Obviamente, estamos ansiosos por recibir noticias.

translation.en: -Well, I can't. I mean-- -It... It's fine.
translation.es: - No puedo, es decir... - Está bien.

translation.en: We can celebrate our anniversary any time.
-♪ Watch it burn, watch it burn ♪ -[phone rings]
Okay, good, good. Yeah, I need your help. How fast can you get here?
translation.es: Sí, necesito tu ayuda. ¿Cuán rápido puedes llegar?

translation.en: Damn, Luther, you need to get a research station somewhere warmer,
translation.es: Maldición, necesitas un lugar más cálido

translation.en: like the Caribbean or some shit.
translation.es: como el Caribe o algo así.

translation.en: You should be here in the winter!
-How many people you say live up here? -Two.

translation.es: El Dr. Vercernis y su asistente.

translation.en: Well, there's no one here now.
Luther, take a look at this.
-What? What is it? -No, no, no, no. Step back. Step back.
Some kind of biomass. Something he found.
translation.es: Algún tipo de biomasa. Algo que encontró.

translation.en: Let's get the hell outta here, man.
We gotta call this in, Mike.
We've transported the biomass and a skull fragment to your lab
translation.es: Llevamos la biomasa y un fragmento de cráneo a su laboratorio

translation.en: Any results for any of the tests?
What about the mycology reports I requested?
translation.es: ¿Y los informes de micología que pedí?

translation.en: Um... Did the search team find anything?
There's no sign of him or Ava.
translation.es: No hay señales de él ni de Eva.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry I got you into this, Mikey.
We are gonna be okay, right?
Yeah, we're gonna be all right, Mike.
[man on PA] Dr. Swann, your family's here.
Are you okay? When are you guys gonna be coming home?
Well, when we start to feel better.
Have I ever let anything happen to your dad?

translation.es: - No. - Exacto. Y no voy a empezar ahora.

translation.en: [boy] I don't have any, Uncle Mike.
-One more and that's "jackass" for you. -Fuck you!
translation.es: - Una más y te ganas ese "idiota". - ¡Jódete!

translation.en: -I always used to win at this game! -Huh.
Just as shitty as the last time.
translation.es: Tan horrible como la última vez.

translation.en: I will give you one guess about today's news.
translation.es: Les daré una pista de las noticias de hoy.

translation.en: Wait, Emil, we don't know why we're not shedding the virus yet.
translation.es: Espere, Emil. No sabemos por qué aún no hay presencia del virus.

translation.en: There is a huge lack of results.
translation.es: Hay una enorme carencia de resultados.

translation.en: Yes, there's a lack of results because no one put it on record.
translation.es: Sí, hay una carencia de resultados porque nadie dejó constancia.

translation.en: It's a harmless Ice Age-era cold.
translation.es: Es un resfriado inofensivo de la Edad de Hielo.

translation.en: Pack your things. Go to your family.
translation.es: Empaque sus cosas. Vaya con su familia.

translation.en: Well, you don't have to tell me twice.
[chuckles] You heard the man, Luther. Let's get the fuck outta here.
translation.es: Ya lo oíste, Luther. Larguémonos de aquí.

translation.en: Mrs. Swann, are you trying to seduce me?
Mrs. Swann... ahem, as a doctor,
I must advise you that any sexual contact, um...
translation.es: debo aconsejarle que cualquier contacto sexual

translation.en: [announcer] Police are saying little about this latest killing.
translation.es: La policía dice poco acerca del último asesinato.
La víctima, una mujer de 33 años,

translation.en: was pronounced dead on the scene in downtown Seneca.
translation.es: fue declarada muerta en el lugar en el centro.

translation.en: Authorities acknowledge possible links to two previous deaths,
translation.es: Las autoridades admiten posibles vínculos con dos muertes previas.

translation.en: whose family members are demanding police be more forthcoming
translation.es: cuyos familiares exigen que la policía dé más información

translation.en: about the brutal nature of these killings,
translation.es: sobre la naturaleza de los asesinatos

translation.en: stating the public need to know
the extent of the danger that they may be in.
Oh, Jesus, Michael. Why would you leave your door open like that?
translation.es: Cielos, Michael. ¿Por qué dejas la puerta abierta?

translation.en: You dropped me for another job.
Mm. Well, that's a new one.
Yeah, I wish I was lying, but it's actually true.
translation.es: Sí, ojalá mintiera, pero es verdad.

translation.en: That's why I told you on the phone...
translation.es: Por eso te dije por teléfono...

translation.en: I'm gonna make it up to you.
You like to talk, don't you, Michael?
I said are you taking me to dinner?
translation.es: Pregunté si me llevarás a cenar.

translation.en: Well, we gotta go. I have an open house in the morning.
translation.es: Debemos irnos. Tengo un evento en la mañana.

translation.en: [Luther] Why am I not getting anywhere with you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no logro nada con ustedes?

translation.en: If that thing talks back, I am so out of here.
translation.es: Si esa cosa responde, me largo.

translation.en: I thought these samples would be swimming with pathogens.
translation.es: Pensé que las muestras estarían llenas de patógenos.

translation.en: I can't even find a virus or a bacteria.
translation.es: Ni siquiera hay un virus o una bacteria.

translation.en: Amino fluorescence test came back negative too.
translation.es: La prueba de fluorescencia también resultó negativa.

translation.en: At least I'm starting to feel more like myself.
translation.es: Comienzo a sentirme más como yo mismo.

translation.en: Fayne said he's never felt better.
translation.es: Fayne dijo que nunca se sintió mejor.
Aquí tienes. La policía evita hablar de un asesino en serie a pesar del último cadáver

translation.en: [man on TV] Police discourage talk of a serial killer despite this latest body
translation.es: La policía evita hablar de un asesino en serie a pesar del último cadáver

translation.en: and certain rumored similarities between the crime scenes of the various victims.
translation.es: y de ciertas similitudes entre las escenas del crimen.

translation.en: At a news conference this afternoon,
translation.es: En una conferencia, el jefe de policía apeló a todos...

translation.en: Seneca Police Chief Paul MacErlane appealed to anyone
translation.es: En una conferencia, el jefe de policía apeló a todos... ¿ASESINO EN SERIE?

translation.en: who may have any information about this latest death
translation.es: ...los que tengan información sobre esta última muerte
para que acudan a la policía.

translation.en: [echoing] ...have combed through hours of surveillance video...
translation.es: también revisaron horas de video de vigilancia,

translation.en: So the veggies, chips, and dip are a really great option
translation.es: Las verduras, papas fritas y salsa son una gran opción

translation.en: if you're looking for something a little bit lighter.
I'll make it up to you.
When? When will you make it up to me?
Don't bitch about this. It's my living.

translation.es: - Les es un ladrón. - Soy policía.

translation.en: This better be good, Les. You really screwed the mood around here.
translation.es: Mejor que esto sea bueno. Arruinaste el ambiente aquí.

translation.en: Raw footage on the new kill.
[woman] What the fuck happened to her neck?
translation.es: ¿Qué mierda le pasó a su cuello?

translation.en: Put this up right away, Jer-gen. Top of the landing page.
translation.es: Súbelo ahora, Jergen. En la parte superior del sitio.

translation.en: I saw my guy, Dr. Mackie, last week.
translation.es: Vi a mi amigo, el Dr. Mackie, la semana pasada.

translation.en: Thought it was an infection, but he couldn't find anything.
translation.es: Creí que era una infección, pero no halló nada.

translation.en: Weird stuff's been happening in my head.
I was sitting here at the bar the other night.
translation.es: Estaba en el bar la otra noche.

translation.en: I had two drinks, that's it.
And all of a sudden, I'm...
Maybe you were just a little...
No. I'm talking about people across the room.
translation.es: No. Hablo de gente al otro lado de la habitación.

translation.en: And I could read a menu 40 feet away.
translation.es: Podía leer un menú a 12 metros.

translation.en: I'm not exactly sure that's possible.
No, no, if you were delusional, you would think it was real. But...
translation.es: No, si estabas delirando, pensarías que era real. Pero...

translation.en: But I do know there's something wrong with me.
translation.es: Pero sé que algo anda mal conmigo.

translation.en: Well, we'll... we'll run some tests, for sure.
I'm sure it's nothing to worry about.
translation.es: No hay nada de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: That's what I say to you whenever there's a lot to worry about.
translation.es: Eso te digo cuando hay mucho de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: You know this is illegal, right?
The coroner's department's paid for by taxpayer dollars.
translation.es: Los contribuyentes le pagan al forense.

translation.en: They've no right to withhold information about a series of vicious murders.
translation.es: No tienen derecho a ocultar información sobre una serie de asesinatos.

translation.en: Get me every autopsy on the killer's victims.
translation.es: Dame todas las autopsias de las víctimas.

translation.en: Not much blood left in them.
Might have something to do with being torn apart.
translation.es: Quizá tenga que ver con ser destrozado.

translation.en: According to this, there was less than there should be.
translation.es: Según esto, había menos de lo que debería.

translation.en: None of these victims have more than two.
translation.es: Ninguna víctima tiene más de dos.

translation.en: And the blood found at the murder scene doesn't account for what's missing.
translation.es: Y la sangre en el lugar no cuadra con lo que falta.

translation.en: [assistant] So, the electron test results came back.
translation.es: Llegaron los resultados de la prueba de electrones.

translation.en: second batch was negative, and Fayne's sample was inconclusive.
translation.es: segundo lote negativo y la muestra de Fayne no fue concluyente.
Veamos si hay patógenos del VSR.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It's time to send it offshore.
translation.es: Lo sé. Hora de enviarlo al extranjero.

translation.en: Proteins that cause really bad shit like mad cow.
translation.es: Proteínas que causan aberraciones como la vaca loca.

translation.en: Boy, you sure know how to talk to a girl.
translation.es: Vaya, sí que sabes hablarle a una chica.

translation.en: how about we all drive over to Emilio's and get a pizza?
translation.es: ...¿qué tal si vamos a Emilio's a comer pizza?

translation.en: I thought I was going to get a much different offer.
translation.es: Pensé que me ofrecerías algo muy diferente.

translation.en: [laughs] I haven't told you what we could do for dessert.
translation.es: No te he dicho qué haremos para el postre.

translation.en: I need your help right now.
-I don't know how it happened, man. -What are you talking about?
translation.es: No sé cómo pasó, viejo. ¿De qué hablas?

translation.en: -Michael! What the-- what the fuck? -Luther, I didn't--
You have to believe me! I didn't do this!
translation.es: Tienes que creerme. ¡Yo no lo hice!

translation.en: I didn't do this. All right? I don't know what happened!
translation.es: Tienes que creerme. ¡Yo no lo hice! ¿Sí? ¡No sé qué pasó!

translation.en: -Who is she? -I don't know what... I don't...
-How'd you get here? What happened? -No, I mean...
-I-- I don't know. -What do you mean you don't know, Mike?
translation.es: - No lo sé. - ¿Qué quieres decir, Mike?

translation.en: I remember I was having a beer. I'm in the bar talking to her,
translation.es: Recuerdo que bebía una cerveza. Hablaba con ella,

translation.en: and she asks me if I could walk her home.
translation.es: y me pregunta si puedo llevarla a casa.

translation.en: -And then that-- that thing started again. -What thing?
translation.es: - Y luego esa cosa comenzó de nuevo. - ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: With my-- with my senses, my hearing, my sight.
translation.es: Con mis sentidos, mi audición, mi vista.

translation.en: [panting] Everything went all crazy, and then...
translation.es: Todo se volvió loco y luego...

translation.en: It just slipped out. -I don't remember anything. -Okay. Okay. Mike...
translation.es: - No recuerdo nada. - De acuerdo. Mike...

translation.en: Sh, sh, sh. You walk her home, right?
Wait! I-- I remember us getting to her building and then...
translation.es: Espera, recuerdo que llegamos a su edificio y luego...
Y el resto está en blanco.

translation.en: Luther, you know me more than anybody else.
You know that I couldn't do this.
translation.es: Sabes que yo no pude hacer esto.

translation.en: -We gotta call the police. -No! They won't believe me.
translation.es: - Hay que llamar a la policía. - No, no me creerán.

translation.en: -Mike, you didn't do anything! -It's open and shut!
I'll go to prison, and we won't know who did this.
translation.es: Iré a prisión y no sabremos quién lo hizo.

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about?
Yeah, that's-- that's who did this shit. Some guy was threatening her.
translation.es: Sí, él fue quien lo hizo. Un tipo que la amenazaba.

translation.en: That's who did this shit. I just need time to find the guy.
translation.es: Él lo hizo. Necesito tiempo para encontrarlo.

translation.en: -I just need some time to find the guy. -No, Mike. We gotta lawyer up.
translation.es: - Debo hallarlo. - No, necesitamos un abogado.

translation.en: When we're ready, sure. I'll do what's right, I promise you.
translation.es: Cuando estemos listos, sí. Haré lo correcto, lo prometo.

translation.en: I promise you, but right now, I just need some time.
translation.es: Lo prometo, pero ahora necesito tiempo.

translation.en: -I'm calling the cops. -No, Luther! Listen to me!
-I didn't do this! You know I didn't! -Sh, sh!
translation.es: ¡Yo no lo hice! ¡Sabes que no fui!

translation.en: -I didn't do this! -Mike, stop. Stop, okay?
What do you have in mind?
-Uh... -Tell me. You're my best friend, right?
Can you help me clean her apartment?
It doesn't work like that, Michael.
No. Forensics are too good now. It's the 21st century.
translation.es: No, los forenses son excelentes. ¡Es el siglo XXI!

translation.en: But we could slow them down.
Right? Just to buy me some time to find the guy.
You're my only hope, man. Please.
translation.es: Eres mi única esperanza. Por favor.

translation.en: You gotta help me. Help me get outta this.
translation.es: Debes ayudarme a salir de esta.

translation.en: I didn't do it. I didn't do it.
So, what the hell happened last night?
[man] It's just past the tracks up here on the right-hand side.
translation.es: Está más allá de las vías, a la derecha.

translation.en: I have to go to the police.
But I'm telling them things that they need to know.
translation.es: Pero les diré cosas que necesitan saber.

translation.en: How could you have done this?
I owe the guy my life...
I couldn't just turn my back on him.
Uh-- I know. I-- I know.
Listen... I-- I-- Obviously, there are things I have to make right...
translation.es: Escucha, obviamente hay cosas que debo corregir...

translation.en: I'll be back in a little bit, okay?
This looks good. Just sign it here.
Uh... My name is Dr. Luther Swann.
I'm a research physician at Bremerton.
Uh, a friend of mine hurt someone...
and I may have helped cover up the crime.
translation.es: ...y quizá lo ayudé a encubrir el crimen.

translation.en: How bad did he hurt this person?
I think you'd better come with me.
Get your hands in the air!
You know it's obstruction. You'll go for five years, right?
translation.es: Sabe que eso es obstrucción. Son cinco años de cárcel.

translation.en: That's why it's only five. Sit down!
I wasn't thinking about finding a lawyer. I'm here to help you find Michael Fayne.
translation.es: No pensaba en eso. Vine a ayudarlo a buscar a Michael Fayne.

translation.en: We had to shoot him to make him stop.
We talked to him two hours, and he was just fine, thanks.
translation.es: Hablamos con él dos horas y estaba bien, gracias.

translation.en: That he won't talk to us on any substantive level.
translation.es: Que no hablará con nosotros en ningún nivel sustancial.

translation.en: How'd they get you here so fast?
He injured four officers on the way in here.
translation.es: Hirió a cuatro oficiales cuando venían.

translation.en: I think he was exposed to pathogens that are causing this behavior.
translation.es: Creo que estuvo expuesto a patógenos que causan este comportamiento.

translation.en: I can hear you, you know.
Do you see what I mean?
There's something very strange going on with this man.
translation.es: Algo muy extraño le está pasando.

translation.en: But the problem is he's not the only killer.
translation.es: El problema es que no es el único asesino.

translation.en: There's another guy, a dentist who committed suicide.
translation.es: Hay otro tipo, un dentista que se suicidó.

translation.en: We got his DNA from crime scene three and four.
translation.es: Encontramos su ADN en la escena de los crímenes tres y cuatro.
Fayne es de la uno y dos.

translation.en: The other killer was a dentist?
Fayne saw his dentist last week.
translation.es: Fayne vio al suyo la semana pasada.

translation.en: Hey, Mike. What's the name of your dentist?
translation.es: Oye, Mike. ¿Cómo se llama tu dentista?
Fayne lo infectó de alguna forma.

translation.en: I need to get in there and talk to him. Alone.
translation.es: Necesito entrar y hablar con él. Solo.

translation.en: He said he would only talk to me.
I always thought getting shot would hurt a lot more.
translation.es: Pensé que ser baleado dolía mucho más.
Como si fuera de hace días.

translation.en: None of this is making sense.
I mean, the elevated sense of hearing, the sight,
translation.es: El sentido aumentado del oído, de la vista,

translation.en: That would require alterations on a cellular level.
translation.es: Eso requeriría alteraciones a nivel celular.

translation.en: There must've been something on that biomass.
translation.es: Debe haber algo en la biomasa.

translation.en: Okay, so then why is none of this shit happening to you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te pasa nada de esto?

translation.en: I don't know that yet, Mike.
I mean, maybe it needs a-- a cofactor, I guess.
But something is causing these changes.
translation.es: Pero algo está causando estos cambios.

translation.en: I did it, Luther. I killed her and the others.
translation.es: Lo hice. La maté a ella y a los demás.

translation.en: -What? No, no, no. Not here. -I think I...
translation.es: - ¿Qué? No, no aquí. - Creo que yo...

translation.en: -It's like I can't control it, you know. -Not here. Mikey, stop it.
translation.es: - Como si no lo controlara. - Mikey, para.

translation.en: -It's like I'm turning into someone else. -Mikey-- In the name of God, please help me.
translation.es: Como si me convirtiera en otro. Por el amor de Dios, ayúdame.

translation.en: Mikey, until you get a lawyer, shut up. They're listening.
translation.es: Mikey, hasta tener un abogado, cállate. Están escuchando.

translation.en: I don't mean help me get out of here. I mean...
translation.es: No digo que me saques de aquí. Digo...

translation.en: How did you say they found you?
about an hour and a half ago.
that new Rover you just bought,
translation.es: Ese Rover que acabas de comprar.

translation.en: And then they tased me, and I forgot it.
translation.es: Luego usaron un táser y lo olvidé.

translation.en: -Till now. -I am here for you, Michael.
translation.es: - Hasta ahora. - Vine por ti, Michael.

translation.en: Yes. It's not just sight and sound, Luther.
translation.es: Sí. No es solo la vista y el oído.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of you, Mike.
I don't even want cash for this. I want points.
translation.es: Ni siquiera quiero dinero. Quiero puntos.

translation.en: Two serial killers, one captured, one dead, and new murder photos?
translation.es: Dos asesinos seriales. ¿Uno capturado, uno muerto y fotos de un nuevo asesinato?

translation.en: I call TMZ with that, you lose everything.
translation.es: Llamo a TMZ con eso y pierdes todo.

translation.en: I give it to you, you break the internet.
translation.es: Si te lo doy, rompes el internet.

translation.en: Only if I get to meet him.
He went batshit in interrogation, super violent.
translation.es: Enloqueció en el interrogatorio, súper violento.

translation.en: They're sending him to Seneca Psych for secure care.
translation.es: Lo enviarán al psiquiátrico para su cuidado.

translation.en: -I know the place. -I can't get you in.
translation.es: - Conozco el lugar. - No puedo meterte.

translation.en: and I'll send you the pics right now.
translation.es: y te enviaré las fotos ahora.

translation.en: Look at these crime scene photos he just sent me of the latest victim.
translation.es: Mira las fotos que me envió de la última víctima.

translation.en: I bet you all her blood is gone...
translation.es: Apuesto a que no tiene sangre.

translation.en: Who knows? It could be true.
We got the results of PMC testing back.
translation.es: Tenemos los resultados de las pruebas de EPCP.

translation.en: But these particular prions are unknown.
They've recovered prions from all three samples.
translation.es: Recuperaron priones de las tres muestras.

translation.en: Biomass, ancient human skull, and a living adult male.
translation.es: Biomasa, cráneo humano antiguo y un varón adulto vivo.

translation.en: West parking lot outside the front entrance.
translation.es: Estacionamiento oeste, afuera de la entrada principal.

translation.en: You're breaking into a secure unit to find a serial killer,
translation.es: ¿Vas a entrar a una unidad para encontrar a un asesino en serie
y paras a tomar un café?

translation.en: Somebody pulling something wouldn't stop for a coffee.
translation.es: Quien trama algo no iría por un café.

translation.en: What's going on? Where the hell have you been?
It's bad news about Mike, Jess.
You mean the mad cow thing?
translation.es: ¿Te refieres a lo de la vaca loca?

translation.en: You had that fever too, you know.
We don't know anything yet, Jess.
But if the changes in him are caused by prions,
translation.es: Pero si sus cambios son causados por priones,

translation.en: but if we re-medicate this guy, we could kill him.
translation.es: pero si lo medicamos de nuevo, podríamos matarlo.

translation.en: I'd like to ask you a few questions.
You don't smell like a doctor.
I want to help you tell your side of the story, Mr. Fayne.
translation.es: Quiero ayudarlo a contar su versión de la historia, señor Fayne.

translation.en: The bullet wounds are almost completely healed,
translation.es: Las heridas de bala están casi curadas,

translation.en: and his hemoglobin's off the scale.
translation.es: y su hemoglobina está fuera de lo normal.

translation.en: Maybe that ties into the missing blood.
translation.es: Quizás es por la sangre perdida.

translation.en: All the victims have been missing a lot of blood.
translation.es: Todas las víctimas han perdido mucha sangre.

translation.en: Way more than we can account for at the scenes.
translation.es: Mucha más de lo que podemos explicar.

translation.en: Now, if he ingested the victims' blood--
they found over a liter of blood in his stomach.
translation.es: hallaron más de un litro de sangre en su estómago.

translation.en: Yet he showed no signs of toxicity or dehydration.
translation.es: Pero no mostró signos de toxicidad ni deshidratación.

translation.en: I don't know who I am...
We need backup. All officers report.
Please tell me I got that.
-Then check it again, top to bottom. -Detective.
translation.es: Revísalo de arriba a abajo. Detective.

translation.en: I have to get home to my wife and my kid.
translation.es: Debo ir con mi esposa y mi hijo.

translation.en: You're not a free man, Swann.
but you don't know where Fayne is.
translation.es: pero no sabe dónde está Fayne.

translation.en: And he thinks I sold him out. My family is in danger.
translation.es: Y cree que lo traicioné. Mi familia está en peligro.

translation.en: I'll see if I can send a patrol car.
No, no, no, no, no. Please, I need to-- to go to them.
translation.es: No. Por favor, necesito ir con ellos.

translation.en: Let me go get them, please.
translation.es: Déjeme ir a buscarlos, por favor.

translation.en: You saw what he did to your officers.
translation.es: Vio lo que le hizo a los oficiales.

translation.en: Hi, it's Jess. Leave a message.
translation.es: Hola, soy Jess. Deje su mensaje.
Jess, no vayas a ningún lado.

translation.en: Call me when you get this. Bye.

translation.es: Creo que algo me está siguiendo.

translation.en: All right, listen to me, Dez. Go home.
Right now. Immediately. Lock the doors.
I'll be there in just a little bit. I'll call 911, okay?
translation.es: Estaré ahí en un rato. Llamaré al 911, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: There was something following me. I swear.
translation.es: Algo me seguía. Lo juro. Yo...
Algo me seguía. Lo juro. Yo... Ahora estás bien.
